events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund. The product I got is completely different from what I ordered.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to receiving the wrong product instead of what was ordered.
The case has been assigned to the refund department for further assistance with the customer's request.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I will help you with the refund process right away.
Could you please provide the order number and attach a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
Here is the order number 987654321 and the photo of the item. As you can see, it’s completely different from what I bought.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and arrange a free return shipment for the incorrect item.
Thank you for the quick help. I appreciate the free return shipping and the refund process.
Your refund is now completed, and you will receive a confirmation email shortly. The return label has been sent to your inbox.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory with how the case was handled.
Yes, I received the refund and the return process was smooth. Thanks again for your prompt assistance.
We are happy to hear that everything was resolved to your satisfaction. We are closing this case now. Have a great day!
